attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
we would like it to be hard for people who do burglary.It should dish out tougher sentences.and also whoever robs peoples houses have to pay back what they took and compensation for the victims
If they have a Drug problem surely going to prison would stop them having drugs....
 I hope that the softies thinking of these new laws never have to go through the Distress & sorrow of having their prized and unreplacable items stolen, or the fact that your own safety has been put at risk by these people entering your property whilst you are asleep in bed........
